org.drip.param.pricer.PricerParams

Packages that use PricerParams
Package Description
org.drip.param.pricer
Pricing Parameters Customization Settings Control

  • Uses of PricerParams in org.drip.param.pricer

    Classes in org.drip.param.pricer that implement PricerParams
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CreditPricerParams
    CreditPricerParams contains the Credit Pricer Parameters - the discrete unit size, calibration mode on/off, survival to pay/end date, and the discretization scheme.
